name: Stories
title: Stories have to be told or they die, and when they die, we can't remember who we are or why we're here

name: Kids Friendly
title: Different types of children’s books, including a rhyming picture book, middle grade chapter book, and a regular picture book.

name: General Knowledge
title: From first words to the Big Bang, from the wonders of nature to city adventures, you will find expert knowledge, hours of fun and endless inspiration in the pages of our books.

name: Competative Exams
title: Here, we provide you the list of the best books for SSC, Banking & Insurance, Railway, Teaching, Defence, Engineering, UPSC, IIT, Medical, and many other State and government Exams.

name: Dramatical
title: A drama has a progressive thought, an emotional climax and a resolution, but our lives aren’t like that. All we get day after day, are a bunch of vague anxieties that are never really resolved.

name: Fictional
title: That’s what fiction is about, isn’t it, the selective transforming of reality? The twisting of it to bring out the essence?

name: Mythological
title: I believe in everything until it's disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it's in your mind. Who's to say that dreams and nightmares aren't as real as the here and now?

name: Autobiographies
title: Autobiography begins with a sense of being alone. It is an orphan form

name: Romance and Fantasies
title: We’re all a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love — true love.
